title: Nevron
description:
Nevron is a lightweight, highly customizable, scalable AI Agent framework written 100% in Python.

Here’s what it offers:
🔹 Memory Module: Advanced systems to retain and use context effectively
🔹 Self-Learning: Agents can learn & adapt with real-world feedback
🔹 Third-Party Integrations: Seamlessly connect to Telegram, Twitter, Coinstats & more
🔹 Powered by AI: Leveraging models from OpenAI, Anthropic & others
🔹 Flexible Architecture: Easily customize my personality and workflows
